about_the_game:
This award-winning in-development game aims to be a physics-based VR shooter with two main modes: Open World Survival with procedurally generated world and structures on one side, and Quick Matches and arenas on the other side. All this while you build and customize the weapons and equipment with your own hands!

The core features of the project include:
-Free to play apocalyptic and competitive experience, with some paid expansions and cosmetics, some of which are obtainable through the Official Discord. You will be prompted to join the discord server from within the experience.

-Intuitive and advanced weapon system, ranging from pistols to guided missile launchers. There are all kinds of weapons, and each of them packs its own features and possible customizations.

-Crafting system with intuitive recipes, refine resources, create components, assemble your projects, and customize them with attachments or component variants.

-Building system with modular components such as the classical foundation, walls, and ceiling, in addition to stations such as dedicated workbenches.

-Vehicle system for air, land, and sea vehicles, fully customizable and configurable.

-Huge progression and tiers of weapons and equipment, you will start making a stone hatchet until you can build a small hut, once you have progressed through the game, you will be able to drive suborbital combat aircraft, or even assemble your own cyborg/android body to have your mind transferred into it for superhuman powers.

-NPCs such as the dumb infected or the savvy specialists, you will find survivors, soldiers, scientists, and everything in between, some of them will help you, others will try to kill you, find out before it's too late!

-Full physics interactions, your body can be pushed and thrown, you will also need a trained stomach, this is a game for VR experts!

-Procedurally generated world, structures, and complexes (bunkers, villages, camps, etc)

content_descriptors.notes:
Warning: The contents depicted in this project are disturbing to some audiences. This is NOT intended for children.

Some topics present include grief, mental illness, extremist politics of all kinds, war crimes, explicit violence, rape and other means of sexual violence, fantasy violence, gore, torture, self-harm, suicide, other self-destructive behaviors, slavery, genocide, terrorism, profanity, offensive speech, discrimination (to races, individuals, sexual orientations, genders or collectives in general) promotion of violence, emotional abuse, eating disorders, pregnancy-related issues, religious topics, fictitious or real sects and cults, indoctrination and manipulation, nudity, fear, body modifications in animals and humans (mutilations, piercings, tattoo, fantasy body parts or from different species) fictitious or real drug abuse, animal abuse, animal cruelty, human or animal bodily waste (such as vomit, feces, or urine), and depiction of natural or manmade disasters that could be misunderstood as representations of real events.

These mentioned topics are not represented as wrongful or bad and are left for the user to interpret. 

This is a work of fiction, but some tools, materials, and production methods are based on reality. Foraging, gathering, and manipulating some elements and tools can be illegal or extremely dangerous, even for trained professionals with the right equipment. Do not imitate any combat or crafting depicted in the project or consider any information as actual knowledge.

No information present in the project is inspired or gathered from actual classified military documents or files. 

Being a physics-based Virtual Reality project, this experience can cause motion sickness in inexperienced users.
This game can display flashing lights and colors that can induce photosensitive epilepsy or extreme dizziness.

Some audiences might experience altered perception of reality and time, existential crisis, illusions, derealization, or disorientation when playing for long sessions. These are completely natural and harmless reactions, some reasons for these include the scaling of the character inside of the virtual environment, optical illusions, the dissonance between the movement of the character inside of the virtual environment and the user in real life, etc. 
Be aware of your surroundings and avoid trespassing the safe bounds of your play area while using Virtual Reality, take breaks often to hydrate and keep the VR headset and devices clean.

This game also offers online multiplayer games and chat, betting and in-game purchases. Please ask an adult before accessing the game or the Steam page if you need help.

All characters depicted are fictional, although other players are real people with real stories and decisions.

Viewer discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intelcore i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070

  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Be yourself without restrictions in this physics-based VR sandbox shooter. Fight for the future of humankind, rise an empire, defeat the mightiest tyrants, explore new horizons, enjoy unmatched experiences with friends, and build your weapons, vehicles, and bases with your own hands.
